title: Have you done anything to your servers?
body:
me & a few friends has a constant 30 ping or so and now it's a constant 145

so I wanted to ask if there's a technical issue with the server.

replies.body: No technical issues, but we've been noticing that Verizon is having some issues with unstable network routing and complete outages as well. If you could, check your ISP to see if they're having problems as well, and if not run a traceroute to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1 using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and post those results here so I can take a look.

Alrighty that's good, not seeing any packet loss there which helps narrow down what's causing this. If you don't mind, send this trace over to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well as your network logs. They can take a much closer look at your logs there and should be able to spot anything else that might be making your ping spike!
